thread.title: Shia LaBeouf busted for public intoxication in Texas
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf busted for public intoxication in Texas - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shia LaBeouf busted for public intoxication in Texas
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct.10 (ANI): Shia LaBeouf seems to be in trouble again as he has been arrested outside a bar in Texas for public intoxication.*
Washington D.C., Oct.10 (ANI): Shia LaBeouf seems to be in trouble again as he has been arrested outside a bar in Texas for public intoxication. The 29-year-old actor, who was reportedly in town for the Austin City Limits music festival, ran down the 6th street and jaywalked in front of police, E! Online reports. However, the 'Transformers' actor ignored police's warnings and was subsequently put in handcuffs. Earlier, LaBeouf was arrested for disrupting a performance of Cabaret and putting on a tear-filled performance art exhibit at a Los Angeles gallery. (ANI) Â»
